NOVELTY_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE ( w2_Novelty.shop_id = @shop_id AND (@novelty_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_Novelty.novelty_id LIKE @novelty_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@novelty_disp_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name LIKE '%' + @novelty_disp_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@novelty_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_Novelty.novelty_name LIKE '%' + @novelty_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND ( @status = '' OR ( @status = 'Preparing' AND w2_Novelty.date_begin > GETDATE() ) OR ( @status = 'OnGoing' AND w2_Novelty.valid_flg = '1' AND w2_Novelty.date_begin <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_Novelty.date_end >= GETDATE() OR w2_Novelty.date_end IS NULL ) ) OR ( @status = 'Suspended' AND w2_Novelty.valid_flg = '0' AND w2_Novelty.date_begin <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_Novelty.date_end >= GETDATE() OR w2_Novelty.date_end IS NULL ) ) OR ( @status = 'Finished' AND w2_Novelty.date_end < GETDATE() ) ) )

NOVELTY_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement:
ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '0' THEN CASE WHEN ( w2_Novelty.date_begin > GETDATE() ) THEN '0' WHEN ( w2_Novelty.valid_flg = '1' AND w2_Novelty.date_begin <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_Novelty.date_end >= GETDATE() OR w2_Novelty.date_end IS NULL ) ) THEN '1' WHEN ( w2_Novelty.valid_flg = '0' AND w2_Novelty.date_begin <= GETDATE() AND ( w2_Novelty.date_end >= GETDATE() OR w2_Novelty.date_end IS NULL ) ) THEN '2' WHEN ( w2_Novelty.date_end < GETDATE() ) THEN '3' END WHEN 1 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_id WHEN 3 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name WHEN 5 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_name ELSE '1' END ASC,
CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 2 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_id WHEN 4 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name WHEN 6 THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_name ELSE '1' END DESC,
CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '7' THEN w2_Novelty.date_begin WHEN '9' THEN ISNULL(w2_Novelty.date_end, '9999/12/31') ELSE NULL END ASC,
CASE @sort_kbn WHEN '8' THEN w2_Novelty.date_begin WHEN '10' THEN ISNULL(w2_Novelty.date_end, '9999/12/31') ELSE NULL END DESC, w2_Novelty.novelty_id ASC
